html:
Dec 22 (Reuters) - AMAZON SPOKESPERSON:

  • EXPERIENCING INVENTORY SHORTAGES ON SOME COVID-19 TESTS DUE TO INCREASED DEMAND

  • WORKING HARD TO SECURE ADDITIONAL COVID-19 TEST INVENTORY AVAILABLE FROM OUR SELLING PARTNERS

  • FOR THE AMAZON COVID-19 TEST COLLECTION KIT, WE SET OUR OWN QUANTITY LIMIT

  • ALWAYS ALLOWED THIRD PARTY SELLERS TO SET THEIR OWN PRODUCT QUANTITY LIMITS FOR COVID-19 TESTS AVAILABLE ON AMAZON.COM


(( Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com ;))
